Package org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules

Class Summary
AbstractSpatialPredicateTwoLyrRule  
FMapGeometryMustBeClosed This rule checks that a fmap geometry is closed.
FMapGeometryMustBeClosedTest  
JtsValidRule Any validated geometry must be a right JTS geometry.
JtsValidRuleTest  
LineMustNotHaveDangles All end points of a line must touch at least another line.
LineMustNotHaveDangles2  
LineMustNotHavePseudonodes This rule checks that lines of a line layer dont have pseudonodes ends (a point that touchs one only another line).
LineMustNotHavePseudonodesTest  
LineMustNotSelfIntersect Lines of a layer must not have self intersections.
LyrMustBeContainedByOneGeometry  
LyrMustBeCoveredByLyr All geometries of origin layer must be covered by a group of geometries of destination layer (it doesnt matter if are covered by one only geometries or a group of them)
LyrMustBeCoveredByOneGeometry All feature geometries of origin layer must be covered by one only element of destination layer.
LyrMustBeEqual All geometries of origin layer must have at least one geometry of destination layer with the same geometry.
LyrMustContainsOneGeometry  
LyrMustCoversOneGeometry  
LyrMustCrossWith Each element of origin layer must cross with at least one element of destination layer.
LyrMustDisjoint feature geometries of origin layer must disjoint with feature geometries of destination layer.
LyrMustNotHaveDuplicated  
LyrMustTouch All features of origin layer must TOUCH (nor intersect or covers, touch) at least one element of destination layer.
MustBeGreaterThanClusterToleranceTest  
MustBeLargerThanClusterTolerance For lines o polygons.
MustNotHaveRepeatedPoints This rule checks that a geometry (line or polygon) dont have consecutive repeated points)
MustNotHaveRepeatedPointsTest  
PointsMustNotOverlap These rule checks that in a point layer there won't be points at a distance lower than the cluster tolerance.
PolygonMustBeClosedTest  
PolygonMustNotHaveGaps  
PolygonMustNotHaveGapsWithJCS All polygons of a vectorial layer must form a continuous surface, without voids or gaps.
PolygonMustNotOverlap The polygons of a given layer must not overlaps each other (their intersection must be a line or a point, not an area)
PolygonMustNotOverlapTest  
PolygonMustNotOverlapWith Topololy rule that checks than polygon geometries of origin layer doesnt checks with polygon geometries of destination layer.
PolygonMustNotOverlapWithTest  
PolygonMustNotSelfIntersect The polygons of a layer must not have self intersections
PolygonMustNotSelfIntersectTest
